name: Roasted Garlic & Red Pepper Jelly Crostini

ingredients.name: soft goat cheese or Fresh cheese
3 Onion Dip Mix or French Onion Dip Mix

preparation: Place baguette slices on a crisper. Lightly brush with oil. Bake until toasted, 5 minutes per side.
Spread goat cheese on baguette slices. Mash in a clove of Roasted Garlic Bulbs on each. Top with Red Pepper Jelly.

products.name: Red Pepper Jelly (new)
summary: A sweet red pepper flavour with a mild heat from cayenne.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
